Name: Cherry Blossom
Ingredients: 2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry with cherry blossom when in season.
Review: Kirsh eau-de-vie and grappa give depth of flavour to vodka as a base in this cherry blossom and maraschino sour.
History: Created by yours truly as a refresh of an old recipe. The refresh became a remake.
Nutrition: One serving of Cherry Blossom contains 159 calories
